text: qareeb hai ki log (nusaire nazaraan) kahegen ki vah teen aadamee the chautha unaka kuttaaa (qatameer) hai aur kuchh log (aaqib vagairah) kahate hain ki vah paanch aadamee the chhatha unaka kuttaaa hai (ye sab) gaib mein atakal lagaate hain aur kuchh log kahate hain ki saat aadamee hain aur aathavaan unaka kuttaaa hai (ai rasool) tum kah do kee unaka sumaar mera paravaradigaar hee khab jaanata hai un (kee ginatee) ke thode hee log jaanate hain to (ai rasool) tum (un logon se) asahaab kahaph ke baare mein sarasaree guphtagoo ke siva (jyaada) na jhagadon aur unake baare mein un logon se kisee se kuchh poochh gachh nahin
